title: Perform a Lightning Strike Test
description: Engineers must test a composite fuselage section to ensure it can safely dissipate the energy from a lightning strike without damaging critical systems.

tasks.description: Attach high-voltage generators to the test article (fuselage section).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all test equipment is properly connected.

tasks.description: Apply a simulated lightning strike (a high-voltage, high-current pulse) to the test article.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent safely conducts the simulated strike.

tasks.description: Inspect the test article for any structural damage and check the connected avionics systems for any electrical upset or damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds no structural damage and confirms all systems are still operational.
